item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18700)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement weather until next saturday 3/20. We are sorry for the inconvenience but we want you all to stay safe and off the roads! We are messaging everyone individually to ensure you are able to collect next Saturday and if not we will do our best to accommodate! Thank you for all of your support and stay warm!
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is back for this weekend's solidarity meals with her very popular pupusas! Yessenia is a beloved leader of Sanctuary4All who, like many of you, has been disappointed in the Biden administration so far as they have failed to make immediate restoration to the communities Trump harmed. This includes our own Democratic senator John Hickenlooper, who has not used his new position to provide aid to immigrants like many other Democratic politicians have in other states. It continues to be up to communities to protect and fight for each other rather than the people our taxes pay to represent us to do their job & serve us. We depend on each other. You can help support Yessenia and her family this weekend by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Justice
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Justice

The bill, which would ban chokeholds and eliminate qualified immunity for law enforcement, now advances to the Senate.

npr.org

House Approves Police Reform Bill Named After George Floyd

item.title: This Saturday Solidary Meals
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This Saturday Solidary Meals

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling pupusas this weekend! She’s been a leader in coordinating the Solidarity Meals program, & she and her husband hope to open their own restaur...ant someday. You can support that dream by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. For pick up in Denver 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 and pick up Boulder 5001 Pennsylvania Ave. Boulder Co 80303 time for pick up 1 pm thank all fir continue support immigrant families

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoPlease see the CDC’s official statement HERE. Importantly, this eviction moratorium is only for evictions in cases...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoPlease see the CDC’s official statement HERE. Importantly, this eviction moratorium is only for evictions in cases of nonpayment of rent.

cedproject.org

Colorado COVID-19 Eviction Defense Project – Fighting evictions and homelessness in Colorado during the COVID-19 crisis

Please see the CDC’s official statement HERE. Importantly, this eviction moratorium is only for evictions in cases of nonpayment of rent.Please see the CDC’s official statement HERE. Importantly, this eviction moratorium is only for evictions in cases of nonpayment of rent.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoRep. Iman Jodeh shared a post to the group: Coloradans for Progressive Action.It is indescribably meaningful to me...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoRep. Iman Jodeh shared a post to the group: Coloradans for Progressive Action.

It is indescribably meaningful to me that the first bill I have moved through its first committee is a bill fighting for renters' rights. I truly believe housin...g is a human right. It brings me a great sense of pride to work on this bill with my friend from a neighboring-district, State Representative Dominique Jackson Stay tuned for calls to action!

See More

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Ingrid is selling empanadas and chocoflan next weekend! The chocoflan in particular is not to be missed. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

UPDATE Angel's family - Call Governor Newsom at 916-445-2841 and let him know now thanks to his inaction ***Angel has been deported*** and is far from his family. Ask him to stop ICE transfers in California. Keep this from happening to other families!

You could say "I am calling your office to request you end ICE transfers from California prisons. After you allowed ICE to pick up Angel Benito A#204-239-454, he tested positive last month for COVID and is at high risk for serious long term impacts. He's now in a country he's barely lived in without his immediate family."
Abolish ICE Denver Sanctuary4All Colorado Colorado People's Alliance
#StopICEtransfers #100DaysOfFreedom
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Ingrid is bringing a new dish this weekend to solidarity meals:...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Ingrid is bringing a new dish this weekend to solidarity meals: empanadas! Not to mention her beautiful artisanal gifts including ponchos, beanies, masks, and jewelry from her home country Peru and some coming from Mexico as well! Don't forget to place your order soon; orders close tomorrow night! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoFrances FrainAguirre shared a live video to the group: Coloradans for Progressive Action.Honor the Earth was live.

Home Team can out in Park Rapids. Sunset Salsa 💃🏽 for the Water to #StopLine3 was a hit. River projecting the sunset of lights was amazing. #WaterIsLife #WaterProtectors -
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: UPDATED with Ingrid’s Venmo. Ingrid is selling empanadas &...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

UPDATED with Ingrid’s Venmo. Ingrid is selling empanadas & chocoflan this weekend, as well as the masks, ponchos, beanies & jewelry that she sells every week to support herself and her family. Although she received a pardon from Governor Polis in December of 2019, she’s still at risk of deportation, and so continues to live in sanctuary, where she’s resided since late 2017. One way you can support her is by purchasing food from her this weekend at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Emergency call take action Hola Jeanette Como están? Mira...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency call take action Hola Jeanette
Como están? Mira disculpa que te moleste pero como sabes mi hijo sigue en GEO y parece que mañana lo van a deportar hemos estado trabajando en el caso de el con el grupo de debug una organización de aquí en California
Pero quisiera saber si me pueden apoyar allá en aurora a llamar a Geo para ver si paran la deportación!

item.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado+31Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverToday, we held a car protest calling on Governor Jared Polis to stop the...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado+31Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Today, we held a car protest calling on Governor Jared Polis to stop the coming wave of mass evictions and CANCEL RENTS & MORTGAGES! Coloradans, like people eve...rywhere in the country, are suffering under the staggering weight of a year of extreme crisis. Over 15% of the state's population may face eviction in the coming months without REAL relief policies.

We demand:
1) Cancel rents and mortgages
2) No evictions
3) No foreclosures
4)Full housing rights and relief for undocumented people
5)Homes for the homeless

Thank you to our cohosts Denver DSA, Sanctuary4All Colorado, Denver Homeless Out Loud, and 9to5 Colorado!

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado
